name: Paneer Butter Masala
ingredients: Paneer (cottage cheese), onions, tomatoes, cashews, ginger-garlic paste, butter, cream, kasuri methi (dried fenugreek leaves), garam masala, red chili powder, turmeric, and salt.
prep_instructions: Make a smooth paste of onions, tomatoes, and cashews. Saut√© in butter until aromatic. Add spices. Add paneer cubes and cream. Cook until flavors meld.
serving_instructions: Serves 3-4 people. Serve with naan or jeera rice.
